name: Stop Windows Service
description: Detects a windows service to be stopped
false_positives: Administrator shutting down the service due to upgrade or removal purposes
query: ((((process.pe.original_file_name:(/[Ss][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Nn][Ee][Tt]1\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR process.executable:(/.*\\[Ss][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt]1\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND process.command_line:/.*\ [Ss][Tt][Oo][Pp]\ .*/) AND (NOT (process.command_line:/[Ss][Cc]\ \ [Ss][Tt][Oo][Pp]\ [Kk][Ss][Cc][Ww][Ee][Bb][Cc][Oo][Nn][Ss][Oo][Ll][Ee][Mm][Ee][Ss][Ss][Aa][Gg][Ee][Qq][Uu][Ee][Uu][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.User:(/.*[Aa][Uu][Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr][Ii].*/ OR /.*[Aa][Uu][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii].*/)))) OR (process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:/.*[Ss][Tt][Oo][Pp]\-[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\ .*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((((process.pe.original_file_name:(sc.exe OR net.exe OR net1.exe) OR process.executable:(*\\sc.exe OR *\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe)) AND process.command_line:*\ stop\ *) AND (NOT (process.command_line:sc\ \ stop\ KSCWebConsoleMessageQueue AND winlog.event_data.User:(*AUTHORI* OR *AUTORI*)))) OR (process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:*Stop\-Service\ *))`
